description:
Kakeru is not adjusting well to the change in stage positions. Matters are only made worse when a writer takes extreme liberties with what he said for a magazine interview. Can he live up to the false image it has created...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Does God Speak with His Own Words?
Kami wa Mizukara no Kotoba de Kataru no ka
神は自らの言葉で語るのか
